headline: Oktoberfest Chili
name: Oktoberfest Chili
description: This Oktoberfest chili is a hearty and different chili with bratwurst, sauerkraut, and German beer, plus the usual chili beans, peppers, and spices.
recipeIngredient: 2.5 pounds fresh bratwurst links, cut into 1-inch slices
2 (15 ounce) cans red beans, drained and rinsed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle German-style beer

recipeInstructions.text: Cook and stir bratwurst in 1 tablespoon bacon drippings in a large skillet over medium heat until browned and no longer pink inside, about 15 minutes. Drain excess grease.

Heat remaining 1 tablespoon bacon drippings in a large, deep pot over medium heat. Add onion, bell pepper, jalapeños, and garlic; cook and stir until onion is translucent, about 8 minutes. Add bratwurst to the pot; stir in red beans, petite diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, crushed tomatoes, tomato juice, sauerkraut, beer, chili powder, sugar, salt, black pepper, cumin, garlic powder, paprika, allspice, and oregano.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer; stir in milk chocolate until melted and dissolved. Simmer for 5 hours, stirring occasionally.
